characters.name: Shouyou Hinata
alt_names: Mr. I Got A Fever And Got Benched
characters.description:
__Teams:__ Yukigaoka Junior High (Former); Karasuno High (Current)
__Number:__ 1 (Junior High 3rd Year); 10 (High School 1st year); 5 (High School 3rd year)
__Position:__ Captain (Junior High); Outside Hitter (Junior High); Middle Blocker (High School)

Hinata has an unusually high ability to jump. Since he was young, Hinata trained his legs to compensate for his lack of height. He joins the Karusuno High School Volleyball team and amazes the team with his natural affinity as a spiker. Although he is a complete beginner and never had any experience playing in a volleyball team, he grows rapidly through each match.

~!After graduating from high school, Hinata traveled to Brazil to gain experience by playing beach volleyball. This is when he got the name, Ninja Shoyo. Upon returning to Japan, he became a member of the MSBY Black Jackals, a Division 1 team in the V-League. He became a member of the Japan Men’s National Volleyball Team during the 2021 Olympics. Currently, that is the year 2022, he is a member of Asas São Paulo, a professional team in the Brazil Super League.!~

characters.name: Tobio Kageyama
characters.description:
__Team:__ Karasuno High, Kitagawa Daiichi Junior High (former) 
__Height:__ 180.6 cm 
__Year:__ 1st Year, class 3 
__Number:__ 9 
__Position:__ Setter 

A famous setter in his middle school who joins the Karusuno High Volleyball team. He was known as the "King of the Court" in his middle school because of his arrogant demeanor and the way he would order around his teammates. Although he still carries an overbearing attitude, he begins to change when he starts to play with Hinata Shouyou who views him as a rival.

characters.name: Makoto Nakashima
characters.description:
In *Kiben Gakuha, Yotsuya-senpai no Kaidan.* - Protagonist of the series where she accompanies her senpai in unraveling the fate of her missing friend.

In *Haikyu!!* - Middle child of the Nakashima family. She often attends [Takeru](https://anilist.co/character/76818/Takeru-Nakashima)'s games and cheers enthusiastically along with the rest of her family.

characters.name: Koushi Sugawara
characters.description:
__Height:__ 174 cm 

Being the vice captain, Sugawara has a soothing personality for his teammates and acts as a pillar of support for them. Even though he isn't Karasuno's official setter anymore, he doesn't dream of giving up on playing in general. As such, he encourages himself and all of his teammates not to give up, no matter how rough the situation might be.

Sugawara's dedication to volleyball is clear when he decides to continue club activities even when most third years choose to retire to focus on their futures. In a meeting, his teacher asked Sugawara why he's so determined to continue playing even though he's not a starting member, and Sugawara replied that he doesn't want to have regrets in the future.

He is also quite perceptive as he noticed how Tanaka asked for the key to the gym (back during the first years' 3-on-3 match) even though he always comes in late, so Sugawara knew that something was up. He is also intelligent as he can come up with helpful tactics during the game. An example of this is when he came up with the idea of saying "bring it" and "send it to me" for Kageyama and Hinata's combo.

characters.name: Daichi Sawamura
characters.description:
__Team:__ Karasuno High 
__Height:__ 176.8 cm 
__Year:__ 3rd year, class 4 
__Number:__ 1 
__Position:__ Wing Spiker 

The captain of the Karasuno High volleyball club.

characters.name: Ryuunosuke Tanaka
characters.description:
__Height:__ 177.2 cm 
__Team:__ Karasuno High 
__Number:__ 5 
__Position:__ Wing Spiker

characters.name: Yuu Nishinoya
characters.description:
__Team:__ Karasuno High, Chidoriyama Junior High (former) 
__Height:__ 159.3 cm (5'2")
__Year:__ 2nd year, Class 3 
__Number:__ 4 
__Position:__ Libero

Yuu is a very energetic and temperamental person. His boisterous nature and crazy shenanigans can attract unwanted attention quite easily, which often bodes ill for him. Although he hardly ever worries about the consequences of his actions (and may even revert to violence in order to vent out his anger on certain occasions), he is surprisingly considerate of his friends' feelings and insecurities.

Yuu can be extremely impatient, excitable and impulsive. As Ryuunosuke Tanaka puts it, "he simply gets too fired up for his own good." He doesn't bother to filter his words, and is therefore prone to blurting out whatever he's thinking in a loud and tactless manner. In-game, however, his attitude changes drastically: he becomes incredibly focused and serious, remaining calm and doing everything in his power to provide the support his team needs until the very end. For this reason, everyone in the volleyball club respects him greatly.

characters.name: Kei Tsukishima
characters.description:
**Height:** 188 cm 
**Team:** Karasuno High
**Year:** 1st year, class 4 
**Number:** 11 
**Position:** Middle Blocker  

A member of the Karasuno High volleyball club. Tsukishima is very blunt and will sometimes rile his teammates up due to his antagonistic nature (most notably being Hinata, Kageyama, Nishinoya, and Tanaka) and sometimes other teams because of his casual smug attitude, taking pride in and relishing when his opponents see him as a nuisance as seen with Tendō and Shirabu. Tsukishima is standoffish and has an arrogant and condescending personality, but he has low self-esteem and thinks of himself as inferior. Although he is only outwardly close with Yamaguchi, he can be seen occasionally caring about his other club members.

characters.name: Chikara Ennoshita
characters.description:
__Team:__ Karasuno High 
__Height:__ 175.4 cm 
__Year:__ 2nd year, class 4 
__Position:__ Wing Spiker

Ennoshita seems quiet and reserved but can behave boldly towards the other 2nd years. He's smart and hasn't received a failing mark before. Similarly to Sugawara, he is always smiling. He's supposedly the only one within the 2nd years to be able to control Tanaka and Nishinoya. He's also able to understand different people, as stated a few times by Tanaka and when he knew what to do to give Yamaguchi some courage before his jump float serve.

characters.name: Asahi Azumane
characters.description:
__Team:__ Karasuno High 
__Height:__ 184.7 cm 
__Year:__ 3rd year, class 3 
__Number:__ 3 
__Position:__ Wing Spiker

In contrast to his appearance, he is rather quiet and gentle and has his difficulties realizing that he is Karasuno's ace as he initially doesn't feel that way. He shows to be weak-willed at the beginning when he leaves the team before the first years come, feeling that he let down his entire team when they lost against Date Tech High even though they counted on him. After coming back to Karasuno, he realizes that his will to play volleyball is much stronger than he thought and with the help of his teammates, he acknowledges his position as Karasuno's ace (even though he is still mocked sometimes by Daichi for not having any "ace-like presence") and gains self-confidence.

characters.name: Kiyoko Shimizu
characters.description:
__Team:__ Karasuno High
__Height:__ 166.2 cm
__Year:__ 3rd Year, class 2 

The manager of the Karasuno High volleyball club.

characters.name: Kouji Sekimukai
characters.description: Hinata's good friend back when they still were attending Yukigaoka Junior High. He's playing soccer.

characters.name: Yukitaka Izumi
characters.description: Hinata's good friend from Yukigaoka Junior High. He's playing basketball, but often helped out Hinata with practicing volleyball.

characters.name: Keishin Ukai
characters.description:
**Height:** 178.2 cm 
**Team:** Karasuno High 

Karasuno High School volleyball club's alumnus, currently coaching volleyball club and helping out his mother at the shop.

characters.name: Kenma Kozume
characters.description:
**Height:** 169.2 cm

The setter of the Nekoma High School volleyball club. Kenma is Kuroo's childhood friend and keeps playing volleyball because of him. He has a very calm personality and is usually doing things at his own pace. Often seen playing video games and being introverted. Nekoma's backbone, brain and heart.

characters.name: Tetsurou Kuroo
characters.description:
__Team:__ Nekoma High School 
__Height:__ 187.7 cm
__Year:__ 3rd Year, class 5 
__Number:__ 1 
__Position:__ Middle Blocker  

The captain of the Nekoma High School volleyball club. Kuroo has a somehow manipulative and cunning personality, but cares about his friends and teammates very deeply. As Nekoma's captain he has a sense of responsibility and confidence. Even though Kuroo's a middle blocker, he often uses offensive plays too.

characters.name: Tadashi Yamaguchi
characters.description:
__Team:__ Karasuno High 
__Height:__ 179.5 cm 
__Year:__ 1st year, class 4 
__Number:__ 12 
__Position:__ Middle Blocker  

Yamaguchi always hangs out with Tsukishima and is very protective of him. He has trained himself hard to use a jump float serve. He is also a substitute ace server of the Karasuno Volleyball team.

characters.name: Tooru Oikawa
characters.description:
__Height:__ 184 cm 

The setter and captain of the Aoba Josai High School volleyball club. He was [Kageyama](https://anilist.co/character/64771/Tobio-Kageyama)'s senpai when they were attending Kitagawa Daiichi. According to Kageyama, he is a very talented setter and volleyball player with a ​complex personality. His favourite food is milk bread.

characters.name: Taketora Yamamoto
characters.description:
__Team:__ Nekoma High School Height: 176.7 cm 
__Year:__ 2nd Year, class 1 
__Number:__ 4 
__Position:__ Wing Spiker  

Yamamoto is proud and short tempered wing spiker of the Nekoma High School volleyball club. He usually doesn't think what he says and is somewhat similar to Tanaka.

characters.name: Sou Inuoka
characters.description:
__Team:__ Nekoma High School 
__Height:__ 185.3 cm 
__Year:__ 1st Year, class 1 
__Number:__ 7 
__Position:__ Middle Blocker  

Middle blocker of the Nekoma High School volleyball club. He has friendly personality and becomes friends with Hinata after their game.

characters.name: Yuuki Shibayama
characters.description:
__Team:__ Nekoma High School 
__Height:__ 162.5 cm 
__Weight:__ 53.3 kg 
__Year:__ 1st Year, class 4 
__Number:__ 12 
__Position:__ Libero  

One of the libero of the Nekoma High School volleyball club.

characters.name: Ittetsu Takeda
characters.description:
__Team:__ Karasuno High 
__Height:__ 166.5 cm 

Volleyball club faculty advisor of the Karasuno High School.  Takeda is inexperienced in volleyball, but still became an advisor for Karasuno. He often doesn't understand rules and that's why he takes notes about every new thing he learns. Takeda has an enthusiastic and brave personality.

characters.name: Yuutarou Kindaichi
characters.description:
__Team:__ Aoba Josai High, Kitagawa Daiichi (former) 
__Height:__ 189.2 cm 
__Year:__ 1st year 
__Position:__ Middle Blocker  

Middle blocker of the Aoba Josai High School volleyball club. He was Kageyama's teammate back in junior high school. Kindaichi was one of the players who hated Kageyama's selfish plays and refused to understand him.

characters.name: Nobuyuki Kai
characters.description:
__Team__: Nekoma High School 
__Height__: 176.5 cm
__Weight__: 68.9 kg 
__Year__: 3rd Year, class 4 
__Number__: 2 
__Position__: Wing Spiker

characters.name: Morisuke Yaku
characters.description:
__Team:__ Nekoma High School 
__Height:__ 165.2 cm 
__Year:__ 3rd Year, class 5 
__Number:__ 3 
__Position:__ Libero  

Currently playing libero of the Nekoma High School volleyball club.

characters.name: Shouhei Fukunaga
characters.description:
__Team:__ Nekoma High School 
__Height:__ 178.3 cm 
__Year:__ 2nd Year, class 2 
__Number:__ 6 
__Position:__ Wing Spiker

characters.name: Manabu Naoi
characters.description:
__Team:__ Nekoma High School 

The coach of the Nekoma High School volleyball club and Ukai's old acquaintance.

characters.name: Yasufumi Nekomata
characters.description:
__Team:__ Nekoma High School 

The coach of the Nekoma High School volleyball club and Ukai's rival. He doesn't like to lose.

characters.name: Hajime Iwaizumi
characters.description:
__Height:__ 179.3 cm 
__Team:__ Aobajousai High School 
__Year:__ 3rd Year, class 5 
__Number:__ 4 
__Position:__ Wing Spiker 
__Ability Parameters (out of 5):__ Power = 5; jump = 4; stamina = 4; intellect = 3; technique = 3; speed = 4  

Is a third-year student from Aoba Johsai High; he is the volleyball team's ace, vice-captain and a wing spiker. He is also Tōru Oikawa's childhood friend and "pillar". Iwaizumi often gets irritated by Oikawa's behavior and tells him that guys who have girls going kyaa kyaa over them irritates him the most.

characters.name: Hayato Ikejiri
characters.description:
__Team:__ Tokonami High School 
__Birthday:__ February 19 __Height:__ 177.2 cm 
__Weight:__ 67.5 kg 
__Year:__ 3rd Year, class 1 
__Number:__ 4 
__Position:__ Wing Spiker 
__Ability Parameters (out of 5):__ Power = 3; jump = 2; stamina = 3; intellect = 3; technique = 3; speed = 2  

Ikejiri went to the same junior high school as Daichi where they played volleyball together.

characters.name: Wakatoshi Ushijima
characters.description:
__Height:__ 189.5 cm (6' 2.6")
__Team:__ Shiratorizawa Academy
__Number:__ 1
__Position:__ Wing Spiker

Wakatoshi Ushijima is a third year at Shiratorizawa Academy and the captain and ace of the school's boys' volleyball team. Currently, he is the number one ace in Miyagi Prefecture and one of the country's top three aces, along with Sakusa and Kiryu. Left handed. His favourite food is hayashi rice.

characters.name: Takeru Nakashima
characters.description: Wakutaniminami High School's key player, he's in his 3rd year. He's the captain of the volleyball team.

characters.name: Yui Michimiya
characters.description:
__Height:__ 159 cm (5' 2")
__Team:__ Karasuno Girls' Volleyball Club
__Year:__ 3rd Year, class 1 
__Number:__ 1 

The captain of the Karasuno High girls volleyball club. Michimiya is shown to be a very active person, always smiling and cracking jokes. She is a very determined person, who cares a lot for her team, giving them motivational speeches, and always tries to stay composed in front of them; she only cries when she's away from her teammates. However, she herself had stated that she isn't strict enough.

Around Daichi though she can become flustered and clumsy, repeating words to try and find the right thing to say.

characters.name: Kaname Moniwa
characters.description:
**Height:** 176 cm 
**Team:** Datekougyou High School
**Number:** 2 
**Position:** Setter 

The captain of the Datekougyou High School volleyball club.

characters.name: Kenji Futakuchi
characters.description:
__Team:__ Datekougyou High School
__Height:__ 184.2 cm 

According to Moniwa, Futakuchi is a problematic kouhai with a very easy going personality. He's often seen arguing with Kamasaki who is the ​complete opposite of Futakuchi.

characters.name: Takanobu Aone
characters.description:
__Team:__ Datekougyou High School 
__Height:__ 191.8 cm 
__Year:__ 2nd Year, class A 
__Number:__ 7 
__Position:__ Middle Blocker 

Main pillar of Datekou. Even though Aone never smiles and seems serious and scary, he actually has a very kind heart. Futakuchi said that Aone has a habit of "locking on" to you if he knows his opponent is an ace.

characters.name: Nobuteru Irihata
characters.description: The coach of the Aoba Josai High School volleyball club.

characters.name: Yuusuke Takinoue
characters.description:
Height: 185.6 cm 
Position: Middle Blocker 

Karasuno High School volleyball club's alumnus. He and Shimada are part of the Karasuno Neighborhood Association team. And they often come to watch current Karasuno's games as well as to root for them. Yuusuke's working at Takinoue Electric Goods.

characters.name: Makoto Shimada
characters.description:
__Height:__ 177.7cm

 Karasuno High School volleyball club's alumnus. He and Takinoue are part of the Karasuno Neighborhood Association team. And they often come to watch current Karasuno's games as well as to root for them. Makoto's working at Shimada Mart.

characters.name: Hisashi Kinoshita
characters.description:
Team: Karasuno High Height: 174.7 cm 
Weight: 65.5 kg Year: 2nd Year, class 2 
Ability Parameters (out of 5): Power = 3; jump = 2; stamina = 3; intellect = 2; technique = 2; speed = 4  

Narita, Ennoshita and Kinoshita are 2nd years who couldn't keep up with the training when old Ukai returned and that's why they left volleyball club. However after some time they came back because they realized that they still want to play volleyball, though coach Ukai was no longer there. Ennoshita called them ''disgraceful'' 2nd years.

characters.name: Kazuhito Narita
characters.description:
__Team:__ Karasuno High
__Height:__ 180.2 cm 
__Year:__ 2nd Year, class 4 

Narita, Ennoshita and Kinoshita are 2nd years who couldn't keep up with the training when old Ukai returned and that's why they left volleyball club. However after some time they came back because they realized that they still want to play volleyball, though coach Ukai was no longer there. Ennoshita called them ''disgraceful'' 2nd years.

characters.name: Koutarou Bokuto
characters.description:
__Height:__ 185.3 cm

Bokuto is a third year student at Fukurodani Academy and is its volleyball team's captain and wing spiker. His spikes pack a powerful punch that others can struggle to receive. Despite this, Bokuto has a tendency to not doing well in the middle of games when getting shut out. Luckily, Akaashi has a whole list of things Bokuto does and tries his best to bring Bokuto back up to his usual self. Besides Akaashi, Bokuto is friends with a few other rival team's players, such as Kuroo and sorta friends with Tsukishima.

characters.name: Keiji Akaashi
characters.description:
__Height:__ 182.3 cm

A second year at Fukurodani Academy, and its volleyball team's vice-captain and setter. Akaashi is often calm and collected, though he does have times where he begins to get worried about things. More often than not, he has to handle Bokuto and all of his antics during the game. When such happens, Akaashi usually thinks of some way to bring Bokuto into peak condition again, though there are times where he struggles with doing so.

characters.name: Hitoka Yachi
characters.description:
__Team:__ Karasuno High 
__Position:__ Manager
__Occupation:__ High School Student (1st Year, Class 5)

A 1st year who was recruited by Shimizu as a manager trainee. She appears to be very nervous, but easily befriends Hinata.

She's paranoid (which causes her to be intimidated easily), very curious, and is organized with her notes, including the ones that she takes from class; this is largely due to her mother being a graphic designer.

characters.name: Yuuji Terushima
characters.description:
**Team:** Johzenji
**Height:** 177 cm
**Number:** 1
**Position:** Wing Spiker
**Role:** Captain

The recently instated captain of the Johzenji volleyball team. Values spirit and fun over all else, contrary to the teams original motto "valor and simplicity." His ways of practice are often very hectic, and include mostly 2 vs 2.

characters.name: Akira Kunimi
characters.description:
__Team:__ Aobajōsai (former Kitagawa Daīchi) (first year at Aoba Johsai)
__Height:__ 182.8 cm
__Number:__ 13 
__Position:__ Wing Spiker

He is a quiet and indifferent person, though it's mostly out of laziness. He occasionally skips practice as well and doesn't seem to put his full effort into matches; however, his true strength lies in his late game plays. Kunimi dislikes loud, energetic people and was dismayed when Koganegawa yelled at him to "go all out", which is one of his least liked phrases. He also refers to Hinata, Koganegawa, and Hyakuzawa as the "idiot squad" because of their energy. Kageyama has also mentioned that Kunimi is smart, though it's unknown if that refers to his game sense or general studies.

characters.name: Lev Haiba
characters.description:
__Team:__ Nekoma High School
__Height:__ 194 cm
__Weight:__ 79,7 kg
__Year:__ 1st Year
__Position:__ Middle Blocker

Lev is a half Russian, half Japanese. However he says he doesn't speak Russian because he was born and raised in Japan. His name in Russian means lion. Lev wasn't around when Karasuno and Nekoma had their first match together. He started playing volleyball in high school, that's why he was still a novice and spent whole time on bench at that time so he didn't come. Lev is blessed with natural physical ability, intuition and height. He declares that he's an ace even though he's a middle blocker. Kenma states that Lev is a good and honest guy.

Lev is quite childish and cheerful, shown when he was making fun of Hinata's height. Lev's appearance, as well as his piercing eyes, causes people to believe he is much more intimidating and serious than he actually is. Though he can be blunt, he never seems to mean any harm and adopts a playful attitude towards most things.
He is also shown to be enthusiastic about spiking as he gets excited about it very easily, and can be competitive with people he is interested in.

characters.name: Saeko Tanaka
characters.description:
Saeko Tanaka is a former student of Karasuno High and the older sister of Ryuunosuke Tanaka. She was also a classmate of the Small Giant during her high school years.

The second years of the volleyball team views her as a cool older sister, especially Nishinoya, but Tanaka thinks of her as a nuisance whenever she bothers his study sessions. Like her brother, she's loud and outspoken.

Her driving has been described by her brother as dangerous as he had once stated to Hinata and Kageyama that he can't guarantee their safety in her car.

characters.name: Akiteru Tsukishima
characters.description: Kei Tsukishima's older brother.

characters.name: Satori Tendou
characters.description:
__Height:__ 187.7 cm (6' 1.9")
__Home town:__ Miyagi Prefecture
__Home country:__ Japan
__Likes:__ Shounen Jump, Chocolate, Ice Cream, Cute Actresses
__Jumping Reach:__ 327 cm

Satori Tendō is a third year middle blocker in Shiratorizawa Academy. He is often referred to as Guess Monster by other teams. He is cheerful and loud, though a bit sardonic. Tendō enjoys teasing both his teammates and opponents, usually annoying the latter. However, when he gets into the game, he becomes a different, more intimidating person, relishing the look of defeat on people's faces when they are denied. He has a high success rate with this blocking style due to his analytical skills and predictions, thus he is confident in his abilities . He also greatly values the fun aspect of volleyball.

~!As an elementary student, he was called a monster for his looks also probably due to the meaning of his name (Satori refers to a Yokai) and was told he couldn't join the volleyball team by other students because of that. Using his guess block, he was able to block the spike of one of his bullies. This event made him feel happy and he continued to use his unique blocking technique to feel that way again despite much opposition until high school. Since his guess block got a lot of points, the Shiratorizawa coach let him join the team without resistance.!~

characters.name: Kanji  Koganegawa
characters.description:
__Height:__ 191.5 cm
__Team:__ Datekougyou High School
__Year:__ 1st year
__Number:__ 7
__Position:__ Setter

Koganegawa is a first year setter at Date Tech High. He is very energetic and enthusiastic but often lacks the ability to think carefully about his actions. Despite being rather simple-minded, he's also shown to be determined to improve his abilities and support his team as their setter and with his height but tends to focus on improving the wrong areas.

characters.name: Kentarou Kyoutani
characters.description:
__Height:__ 178.8 cm
__Team:__ Aoba Johsai High
__Year:__ 2nd Year, Class 1
__Position:__ Right-Wing Spikers

He is said to have the best ability among the second years at Aobajōsai High, but his brash attitude is cause for poor relationships with other members of the volleyball team. He doesn't seem to show any respect for the third years (besides Iwaizumi), irritating them and shocking the first years upon Kentaro's return to the team. He is extremely strong, and he can only hit the ball with his full strength or he "doesn't feel satisfied."

characters.name: Kazuma Bobata
characters.description:
Team: Johzenji High
Height: 185.9 cm
Weight: 71.8 kg
Year: 2nd Year
Number: 2
Position: Middle Blocker

Bobata is a second year student in Johzenji High. He is one of the volleyball team's middle blockers. He appears to be very carefree and outgoing. Like his teammates, he has a reckless playing style and is confident about winning, but after losing to Karasuno, he seems to have calmed down a lot.

characters.name: Issei Matsukawa
characters.description: Issei is a 3rd year student from Aobajohsai High; he is one of the middle blockers.

characters.name: Shinji Watari
characters.description: Shinji is a second year libero in Aobajohsai High.

characters.name: Takahiro Hanamaki
characters.description: Takahiro is a 3rd year wing spiker at Aobajohsai High.

characters.name: Sadayuki Mizoguchi
characters.description: Sadayuki is the coach of Aobajohsai High.

characters.name: Shigeru Yahaba
characters.description: Shigeru is a 2nd year setter at Aobajohsai High.

characters.name: Tamahiko Teshiro
characters.description: Tamahiko is a first year setter and a pinch server at Nekoma High.

characters.name: Tatsuki Washio
characters.description:
__Height:__ 187.8 cm (6'1.9")
__Uniform Number:__ 2

Tatsuki is a third-year middle blocker at Fukuroudani Academy.

characters.name: Yamato Sarukui
characters.description:
__Height__: 181.5cm

Yamato is a third year wing spiker in Fukuroudani Academy.

characters.name: Kaori Suzumeda
characters.description: Kaori is a first year student at Fukuroudani Academy. She is one of the team's managers.

characters.name: Haruki Komi
characters.description: Third-year high school student at Fukuroudani Academy. He is the starting libero on the boys' volleyball team.

characters.name: Yukie Shirofuku
characters.description: Yukie is a third year student at Fukuroudani Academy. She is one of the team's managers.

characters.name: Wataru Onaga
characters.description: Wataru is a first year middle blocker at Fukuroudani Academy.

characters.name: Akinori Konoha
characters.description: Akinori is a third year wing spiker from Fukuroudani Academy.

characters.name: Takurou Oiwake
characters.description: Takurou is the coach of Date Tech High's volleyball team.

characters.name: Mai Nametsu
characters.description: Mai is a second year at Date Tech High. She is the volleyball club's manager.

characters.name: Yutaka Obara
characters.description: Yutaka is a second year wing spiker of the Date Tech High Volleyball Club.

characters.name: Kousuke Sakunami
characters.description: Kousuke is a first year libero at Date Tech High.

characters.name: Takehito Sasaya
characters.description: Takehito is a third year Wing Spiker at Date Tech High.

characters.name: Jingo Fukiage
characters.description: Jingo is a first year at Date Tech High. He plays as one of the volleyball club's middle blockers.

characters.name: Tarou Onagawa
characters.description: Tarou is a 2nd year student at Date Tech High. He became one of the team's wing spikers after the 3rd years retired.

characters.name: Tsutomu Goshiki
characters.description:
__Height:__ 181 cm (5'11")
__Hometown:__ Miyagi Prefecture

Tsutomu Goshiki is a first year wing spiker in Shiratorizawa Academy. Goshiki appears to have been a capable volleyball player even before entering Shiratorizawa Academy. In one of his recollections, he is seen being praised by an elderly lady while showing off a volleyball related trophy. He is also frequently acknowledged for his height and reliability as an ace.

characters.name: Eita Semi
characters.description:
__Height:__ 179.5 cm (5' 10.7")
__Hometown:__ Miyagi Prefecture

Eita Semi is a third year setter in Shiratorizawa Academy. Like most members of the Shiratorizawa Boys' Volleyball Team, Semi got into the school through a sports scholarship. He was a famous setter during his time at middle school and the main setter for Shiratorizawa before being replaced by Shirabu.

characters.name: Reon Ouhira
characters.description:
__Height:__ 182.7 cm (5' 11.9") 
__Hometown:__ Miyagi Prefecture

__Introduction:__
Reon is a third year wing spiker at Shiratorizawa Academy. It's implied that he was accepted due to a sports scholarship for volleyball.

__Personality:__
Ouhira has a soothing personality and tends to be responsible for calming his teammates down when they're hyped up. He doesn't get riled up easily and is similar to Ushijima when it comes to his temperament; along with Ushijima, he wasn't upset about the hundred serves they had to do upon losing. He is confident in his own abilities, going up against three blockers and performing well despite being aware of the audience's disappointment that it wasn't Ushijima attacking.

(Source [Haikyuu!! Fandom Wikia](https://haikyuu.fandom.com/wiki/Reon_%C5%8Chira))

characters.name: Kenjirou Shirabu
characters.description:
__Height:__ 174.8 cm (5' 8.8")
__Hometown:__ Miyagi Prefecture

__Introduction:__
Kenjirou Shirabu is a second year setter at Shiratorizawa Academy. He is the only player on Shiratorizawa's Boys' Volleyball Team who didn't get into the school with a sports scholarship. He took the exam to get into Shiratorizawa in hopes of being able to play with tall and strong players after watching Ushijima play in junior high. 

__Personality:__
He is respectful towards his upperclassmen but tends to bicker with Goshiki, a first year. Though he appears serious and composed, Shirabu is extremely hot-headed and gets annoyed at nearly every move his opponents pull. However, he is capable of recomposing himself quickly. He is also very studious and hardworking, spending all of his free time studying in order to pass the difficult entrance exam for Shiratorizawa. During junior high, he had good grades.

(Source: [Haikyuu!! Fandom Wikia](https://haikyuu.fandom.com/wiki/Kenjir%C5%8D_Shirabu))

characters.name: Taichi Kawanishi
characters.description:
__Height:__ 188.3 cm (6' 2.1")
__Hometown:__ Miyagi Prefecture

__Introduction:__
Taichi Kawanishi is a second year middle blocker at Shiratorizawa Academy.

__Personality:__
He doesn't talk to his teammates very often, and appears mostly emotionless, only looking annoyed on occasion. He has been seen crying once. He doesn't seem to put much effort into his playing and sometimes accidentally lets a ball in; however, since he's a starting member in Shiratorizawa, his abilities shouldn't be too low. Tendō has noted that Kawanishi has an eclectic and more analytical blocking style, which the third year's a little annoyed by; Kawanishi would use guess blocking on occasions and switch back to read blocking when needed. He also won't fight any uncertain battles.

(Source: Haikyuu!! Fandom Wikia)

characters.name: Tanji Washijou
characters.description: Tanji is the head coach of Shiratorizawa Academy Boys' Volleyball team.

characters.name: Hayato Yamagata
characters.description:
__Date of Birth:__ February 14, 1995
__Height:__ 174.3 cm (5' 8.6")
__Weight:__ 66.5 kg (146.6 lbs)
__Likes:__ Uni donburi (Sea urchin on rice)
__Hometown:__ Miyagi Prefecture

__Introduction:__
Hayato Yamagata is a third year libero in Shiratorizawa Academy.

__Personality:__
He is serious and focused on the game. When Nishinoya pulled off an incredible move, Yamagata grinned widely. It's been shown he is similar to Nishinoya when it comes to 'getting into' the game, yet he seems more aggressive than most liberos. Yamagata is also seen being very supportive of his kouhai, Goshiki, and was shown telling Ushijima when he was being unintentionally rude towards him. He appears to be very protective of the younger years and often acts as a mentor.

(Source [Haikyuu!! Fandom Wikia](https://haikyuu.fandom.com/wiki/Hayato_Yamagata))

characters.name: Suguru Daishou
characters.description:
__Height:__178 cm
__Year:__ Third Year Highschool Student
__Number:__ 1
__Position:__ Captain, Outside Hitter
__Team:__ Nohebi Academy

Daishou is a competitive person who enjoys mocking others, especially the members of Nekoma. However, he gets flustered and emotional when he is mocked in return, such as when Kuroo brought up his ex-girlfriend.He is a cunning, manipulative person who uses a polite façade during matches to win the referee's favor; he would admit to net-touches and apologize loudly to bolster Nohebi's reputation, but use somewhat underhand tactics without the audience knowing, such as purposely spiking a ball at an opponent's face and using the referee's influence to get away with spikes that were originally out. During the match, he shows composure in analyzing the situation of the match, which is pointed out by the Nohebi coach.

characters.name: Kiyoomi Sakusa
characters.description:
Itachiyama Academy's second-year ace and one of the top three aces of Japan. He is calm and collected, yet very competitive and proud. He's also a germaphobe, often wearing a mask when not playing volleyball. 

~!He eventually became an outside hitter for the MSBY Black Jackals, a V-League Division 1 team. He became a member of Japan's National team during the 2021 Olympics.!~

A third year at Inarizaki High and the volleyball club's wing spiker and ace. He is also one of the top aces in Japan. He is best friends with the Miya twins and good friends with Kita Shinsuke, the teams captain.

characters.name: Atsumu Miya
characters.description:
__Height:__ 183 cm
__Year:__ Second Year Highschool Student
__Number:__ 7 
__Position:__ Setter
__Team:__ Inarizaki High

Atsumu Miya is an second year highschool student who lives in Hyogo Prefecture, Japan.

Outwardly, Atsumu appears to be a carefree, confident person who's usually seen with a lazy smile on his face, though he enjoys provoking people and giving offhand compliments. He can be quite condescending, and somewhat selfish at times. His twin brother, [Osamu Miya](https://anilist.co/character/139492/), describes him as someone who doesn't listen to others, doesn't return what he borrows, and lies habitually. He also appears to be a perfectionist who has ridiculously high standards for himself and his spikes. Atsumu is a competitive person who hates losing; sometimes, these traits can veer off in a bad direction.

~!As of 2018, he is a member of MSBY Black Jackals, a professional volleyball team in Division 1 of Japan's V. League. He is also a member of the Japan National Volleyball Team and participated in the 2021 Olympics.!~

characters.name: Osamu Miya
characters.description:
__Height:__183 cm
__Number:__11
__Position:__ Opposite Hitter
__Team:__ Inarizaki High

Osamu is a second-year high school student who lives in Hyogo Prefecture, Japan.

Osamu appears to be the calmer of the Miya twins with a laid-back and deadpan personality. Despite his outward demeanor, Osamu is highly competitive and becomes heated even if it isn't obvious on the surface. Osamu is also shown to have a large passion for food. He thinks about it often in the middle of a match and would get distracted by the smell of it. He can't seem to pick a favorite food and wouldn't know what to eat as his last meal. Like his brother, Atsumu Miya, he loses self-control when it comes to eating. He's shown to have a sense of humor, especially regarding Atsumu, whom Osamu teases whenever he messes up.

Hoshiumi Originally planned on playing basketball, but he decided to join the volleyball team in second grade. His reason was listed as wanting to be free from his older brother, Akitomo, who constantly sneered at Hoshiumi over their height difference. Despite his reasoning at first, Hoshiumi soon came to love the sport as he watched official matches on TV.

__Height:__ 178 cm
__Nationality:__ Half-Russian; Half-Japanese
__Likes:__ Sushi

Alisa is an older sister of first year Nekoma Team player: [Lev Haiba](https://anilist.co/character/89517/Lev-Haiba).

From the moment of her debut, Alisa has acted as lively and bubbly, but also as innocent as her brother is. She is very supportive of Lev, affectionately referring to him as "Lyovochka" and cheering him on during his match. It's also been implied that she's a bit of an imaginative romantic, which was shown when she quickly jumped to the conclusion that Akane was in love with Lev.

(Source: Haikyuu!! Wikia)

characters.description:
__Height:__ 182.5 cm (5' 11.9")
__Uniform Number:__ 6
__Position:__ Wing Spiker (ace)

Wing spiker and ace of Niiyama Girls' High SChool Volleyball Team and [Tanaka](https://anilist.co/character/67325/Ryuunosuke-Tanaka)'s childhood friend.
